column1: leather armor studded with gemstones, battle-worn but elegant
flowing elven robes with intricate silver embroidery
chainmail hauberk over padded jerkin, sword belt at waist
druidess wraps made from woven vines and moss
royal gown with golden thread and precious stones
assassin's hood and dark leather bodysuit, silent and deadly
paladin's plate armor gleaming with holy symbols
barbarian furs and bone jewelry, primitive yet fierce
wizard robes covered in mystical runes and star patterns
ranger's practical leather and cloth, earth-toned and weathered
noble's doublet with rich fabrics and heraldic designs
monk's simple robes tied with rope belt, humble yet dignified
sorceress dress that shimmers with magical energy
peasant clothes patched and mended, honest and humble
thief's dark clothing perfect for skulking in shadows
